nodes.text: Flensors were a species of carrion bird capable of flight and native to the planet Sakiya within the Saki system in the region of the galaxy known as Hutt Space. The planet's native sentient species, the Sakiyans, considered flensors a bad omen, especially if they saw one flying over their bonepit.

Flensors were first mentioned in the novel MedStar II: Jedi Healer which was released in 2004 and written by Michael Reaves and Steve Perry. They then received an entry in the 2008 sourcebook The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo and Stephen J. Sansweet along with numerous co-authors. Neither source states if they are sentient or not.
